143a7(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de ltar gzhan dag la yang dag por ston pa dang / yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par yang dag par gzing bstod pa
143a8(khri brgyad): dang yang dag par rab du dga' bar byed pa de ni bdag kyang nyams par mi 'gyur la/ de dag la yang sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa yin//
143b1(khri brgyad): ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar gzhan dag la yang dag par bstan par bya/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par bya/ yang dag par gzeng
143b2(khri brgyad): bstod par bya/ yang dag par rab du dga' bar bya ste/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi de ltar chags pa'i mtha' thams cad yongs su spong bar
143b3(khri brgyad): bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gang khyod kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la
143b4(khri brgyad): chags pa'i mtha' de dag bsten pa lag so// rab 'byor chags pa'i rnam pa des pas kyang phra ba zhan dag kyang khyod la bstan par bya/ de dag la legs par rab
143b5(khri brgyad): du nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin no zhes gsol ste/ bcom
143b6(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor 'di la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la
143b7(khri brgyad): yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs par ma tshan mar yid la byed na/ rab 'byor ci tsam du mtshan ma ra
143b8(khri brgyad): yid la byed pa de tsam du chags pa yin no// gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi thugs dag gi bskyed pa nas nye bar gzung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag pa
144a1(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya
144a2(khri brgyad): ngan la sa 'das nas/ ji srid du dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad mtshan mar yid la byed cing / yid la byas nas kyang bla na
144a3(khri brgyad): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du yongs su bsngo bar byed na/ rab 'byor ji tsam du mtshan mar yid la byed pa de tsam du chags pa yin no// de bzhin gshegs
144a4(khri brgyad): pas chags pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de dag dang / de las gzhan pa sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang mtshan mar yid la
144a5(khri brgyad): byed pa de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du yongs su bsngo ba byed na/ rab 'byor ci tsam du mtshan mar yid la byed pa de tsam du chags pa yin no//
144a6(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa ni mtshan par yid la bye ba ma yin la/ de dag las gzhan pa rnams kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba dag kyang mtshan mar yid la
144a7(khri brgyad): byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni zab
144a8(khri brgyad): ba lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dben pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
144b1(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bdag phyag 'tshal lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni ma byas
144b2(khri brgyad): shing mngon par 'dam byas pa ste/ de ni sus kyang mngon par rdzogs par rtogs par mi nus so// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams
144b3(khri brgyad): cad ni mngon par rdzogs par rtogs par dka' ba lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di chos kyi rang bzhin ni gnyis ma yin te/
144b4(khri brgyad): cig tu zed do// rab 'byor chos kyi rang bzhin gcig pa gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin ma yin no// gang rang bzhin ma yin pa de ni ma byas pa'o// gang ma byas pa de ni
144b5(khri brgyad): mngon par 'du ma byas pa ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar rang bzhin gcig pa dang / rang bzhin ma yin pa dang ma byas pa dang /
144b6(khri brgyad): mngon par 'du ma byas par shes na/ chags pa'i mtha' thams cad yongs su spangs pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi
144b7(khri brgyad): pha rol du phyin pa ni rtogs par bka' ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sus kyang ma mthong
144b8(khri brgyad): mthos shong bye brag ma byed de/ rnam par ma shes la mngon par rdzogs par khong du ma chung ba yin no// / rab 'byor byas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi
145a1(khri brgyad): pha rol du phyin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
145a2(khri brgyad): 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni sus kyang mi shes te/ gzugs kyis mi shes so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
145a3(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pas mi shes so// khams dang skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams kyis mi shes so// pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang stong/
145a4(khri brgyad): pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams mi shes so// stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig
145a5(khri brgyad): ba rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis mi shes so// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ chos thams cad rnam par
145a6(khri brgyad): dag pa bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste sum bcu drug pa'o// / do nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces
145a7(khri brgyad): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni bgyid pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha
145a8(khri brgyad): rol du phyin pa ni chos thams cad dmig su med par byed pa'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
145b1(khri brgyad): pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
145b2(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa spyod pa lags te/ gzugs la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du
145b3(khri brgyad): byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang /
145b4(khri brgyad): rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams dang / pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs
145b5(khri brgyad): rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
145b6(khri brgyad): nyid kyi bar dag la ni mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// gal te gzugs rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
145b7(khri brgyad): rol du phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ gal te gzugs bde zhes bya ba dang sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang /
145b8(khri brgyad): sdug ces byab / mi sdug ces bya bar mi skyed na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod po 'on mo// 'dezhes bya ba dang sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ga bdag ces
146a1(khri brgyad): bya ba dang bdag med ces bya ba dang / sdug ces bya ba dang mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la
146a2(khri brgyad): spyod pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa'am mi
146a3(khri brgyad): sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bur gzugs med la/ gang brtag pa'am mi brtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa 'am/
146a4(khri brgyad): sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang med cing de bzhin du gang rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa 'a
146a5(khri brgyad): bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag kyang med pa'i phyir ro// rab
146a6(khri brgyad): 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa/ gal te gzugs yongs su rdzogs par 'am/
146a7(khri brgyad): yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
146a8(khri brgyad): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pa 'am/ yongs su ma rdzogs pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa yin no//
146b1(khri brgyad): de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su ma rdzogs pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de ci'i
146b2(khri brgyad): phyir zhe na/ gzugs yongs su rdzogs pa'am yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no// zhes bya bar de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes
146b3(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la ma spyod pa yin la// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su rdzogs
146b4(khri brgyad): pa'am/ yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa yin no// zhe bya bar de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa yin zhing
146b5(khri brgyad): de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongasu rdzogs pa 'am yongs su mi rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ma yin no// zhes
146b6(khri brgyad): bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa yin pa'i phyir ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa
146b7(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chags pa dang / ma chags pa ma mchis pa gang yin pa gang lags pa de dag bcom
146b8(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la legs par gsung ba ni ngo mtshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
147a1(khri brgyad): rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
147a2(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la chags pa dang / ma chags pa dag legs par bshad de/ rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
147a3(khri brgyad): / dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa gzugs chags pa med pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa yin
147a4(khri brgyad): / nor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa chags pa med pa zhes bya bor mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du pa la spyod pa'in/
147a5(khri brgyad): mig chags pa med pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid chag
147a6(khri brgyad): bamed pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes bi kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la chags pa med pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes
147a7(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du rdul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes ra
147a8(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol du phyin pa la chags pa med pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa
147b1(khri brgyad): rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
147b2(khri brgyad): nyid chags pa med pa zhes bya bar mi spyodan/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
147b3(khri brgyad): chen po de ltar spyod pa ni gzugs chags pa med pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
147b4(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa chags pa med pa pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du chags pa med pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa
147b5(khri brgyad): med do// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang /
147b6(khri brgyad): rang byang chub dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la chags pa med pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// 'phags pa shes rab kyi
147b7(khri brgyad): pha rol du phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las// bam po nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o/
148a1(khri brgyad): de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chos bstan pa
148a2(khri brgyad): zab mo 'di bshad kyang 'phel ba ma mchis la/ ma bshad kyang 'grib pa ma mchis pa de ni ngo mtshar ba lag so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
148a3(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di bshad kyang 'phel ba med
148a4(khri brgyad): lam pa shad kyang 'grib pa medado// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji srid 'tsho bar du
148a5(khri brgyad): bzhugs shing na mkha'i bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod par gyur kyang / na mkha' la ni bsngags pa brjod kyang 'phel ba med la/ bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod kyang 'gri
148a6(khri brgyad): pa med de/ na mkha' ni bsngags kyang 'phel ba med/ ma bsngags kyang 'grib pa med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu la ni bsngags pa brjod
148a7(khri brgyad): kyang 'phel ba med la/ bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod kyang 'grib pa med de// bsngags pa brjod kyang rjes su chags pa med la/ bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod kyang
148a8(khri brgyad): khong khro ba med do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de yang bshad kyang de bzhin ma bshad kyang de bzhin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/
148b1(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom na/ zhum par yang
148b2(khri brgyad): mi 'gyur la/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la rnal 'byor du bgyid pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang snga rim ldog pa de dag ni dka'
148b3(khri brgyad): ba bgyid pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa de ni nam mkha' bsgom pa lags te/ na mkha
148b4(khri brgyad): la ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma mchis/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /
148b5(khri brgyad): tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yang ma mchis so/ 1/ nam mkha' la ni gzugs kyang ma mchis/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
148b6(khri brgyad): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang ma mchis/ na mkha' la ni nang stong pa nyid kyang ma mchis/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yang ma mchis/ na mkha' la ni
148b7(khri brgyad): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang ma mchis/ yang dag pa'i spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam
148b8(khri brgyad): rnams kyang ma mchis/ na mkha' la stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang ma mchi/
149a1(khri brgyad): na mkha' la ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang ma mchis/ de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'od
149a2(khri brgyad): ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub kyang ma mchis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// bcom
149a3(khri brgyad): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis sems can rnams kyi slad du go cha 'tshal ba de ni/ na mkhi' slad du brtson par 'tshal ba dang / 'bad
149a4(khri brgyad): par 'tshal ba dang / bsnol bar 'tshal ba lag so// bcom ldan 'das gang dag sems can rnams kyi slad du/ go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni/ na mkha' yongasu dgrol
149a5(khri brgyad): bar 'chal ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis na mkha' lta bu'i chos thams cad kyi slad du go cha 'chal ba
149a6(khri brgyad): de dag ni go cha chen po 'chal ba lag so// bcom ldan 'das gang dag gis sems can rnams kyi slad du go cha chen po 'chal ba de dag ni/ na mkha' bar snang 'degs pa
149a7(khri brgyad): 'tshal ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sems can rnams kyi slad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byas
149a8(khri brgyad): chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de dag ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa lag te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
149b1(khri brgyad): chen po gang dag gi des bu'i gon 'tshal ba de dag la bdag phyag 'amal lag so// de co'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jis
149b2(khri brgyad): rten gyi khams 'di de bzhin gshegs pa dag gi 'di lta ste dper bgyi na/ 'das bu'i 'tshal lam/ 'od ma'i 'tshal lam/ bu ram shing gi 'tshal lam/ ma
149b3(khri brgyad): rgyu'i 'tshal lam/ til gyi zhing ltar yongasu bltam par gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par chos bshad par
149b4(khri brgyad): gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa re res kyang sems can chad ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa de dag kyang yongs su smin par mdzad kyang bcom ldan 'das sems can
149b5(khri brgyad): gyi khams la ni 'grib pa 'am 'phel ba mi mngon pa'i slad du'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das sems can ma mchis pa dang / sems can dben pa'i
149b6(khri brgyad): slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du phyogs bcu thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang / de bzhin gshegs pa dag gis 'di lta ste dper na brgya ni
149b7(khri brgyad): 'de bu'i 'tshal lam/ 'od ma'i 'tshal lam/ bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ mda' rgyu'i tshal lam/ til gyi shing ltar yongs su bltam par gyur cing bzhugs
149b8(khri brgyad): la de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis bskal pa 'am bskal pa las lhag par chos bshad par gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa re res kyang sems can tshad ma man+di
150a1(khri brgyad): grangs ma mchis pa dag kyang yongs su smin par mdzad kyang / bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi khams la 'grib pa 'am
150a2(khri brgyad): 'phel bar mi mngon lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das sems can ma mchis pa dang dben pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des ni
150a3(khri brgyad): bdag gis 'di skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sems can rnams kyi slad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
150a4(khri brgyad): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de dag ni na mkha' yongs su grol bar 'tshal ba lags so zhes gsol to// de nas dge slong zhig 'di snyam du sems te 'di lta ste/ chos gang
150a5(khri brgyad): yang skye ba yang med/ 'gag pa yang med/ tshul khrims kyi phung po yang yod/ shes rab kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i
150a6(khri brgyad): ye shes mthong ba'i phung po yang yod/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub kyang yod//
150a7(khri brgyad): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang yod/ dkon mchog gsum dang sangs rgyas dang / chos dang dge 'dun dang yod/
150a8(khri brgyad): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yang yod pa'i bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// snyam so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/
150b1(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smraso// btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la rnal 'byor
150b2(khri brgyad): du byed pa de dgang la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
150b3(khri brgyad): 'di la bslab par bya bar sems dpa' de ni na mkha' la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//
150b4(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang /
150b5(khri brgyad): tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de la bdag gis bsrung ba dang skyab pa dang / sba ba ji lta bu zhig bgyid lags/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka khyod kyis gang
150b6(khri brgyad): la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bya ba/ chos de yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor gang la bsrung ba dang /
150b7(khri brgyad): skyab pa dang / sba bar bya ba'i chos de ni kho bos yang dag par rje su ma mthong ngo // rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
150b8(khri brgyad): ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la danas pa/ 'di nyid la bsrung ba dang / sgrub pa dang / sbed par 'gyur ro// ji skad bstan pa'i
151a1(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di dang / ma bral na/ de la mi dang mi ma yin rnams kyi kyang grags rnyed par mi 'gyuraro// ke'u shi
151a2(khri brgyad): ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa gang zhig bsrung ba dang / sgrub pa dang / sba bar sems pa de ni/ na mkha'
151a3(khri brgyad): la ni bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang sba bar sems pa yin no// ke'u shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyi sgyu ma dang / mig sgyu dang / rmi lam dang / brag ma dang /
151a4(khri brgyad): mig yer dag bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar nus snyam 'am/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni mi
151a5(khri brgyad): nus so// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka de bzhin du gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa dag
151a6(khri brgyad): la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba bya bar sems pa de yang de ltar mi 'grub pa dang / ngal ba'i skal ba can du 'gyur bar zad// ke'u shi ka 'di ji snyam du
151a7(khri brgyad): sems khyod kyi de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa dag la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar nus sum 'am/ brgya byin gyis smras
151a8(khri brgyad): ba btsun pa rab 'byor de ni mi nus so// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ke'u shi de bzhin du gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
151b1(khri brgyad): rol du phyin pa dag las bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bya bar sems pa de yang 'di ltar mi 'grub pa dang / ngal ba'i skal ba can du 'gyur bar zad do// ke'u
151b2(khri brgyad): shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyi chos kyi dbyings dang yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / de bzhin nyid dang / bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i dbyings bsrung ba dang / bskyab
151b3(khri brgyad): pa dang / sba bar nus snyam 'am/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni mi nus so// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka de bzhin du gang zhig byang chub sems
151b4(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa dag la bsrung ba dang / sgrub pa dang / smra bar sems pa de yang 'di ltar mi 'grub pa dang / ngal ba'i
151b5(khri brgyad): skal ba can du 'gyur bar zad do// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas/
151b6(khri brgyad): ci tsam gyis na chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang / mig rgyu lta bu dang / brag cha lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / chos thams cad sprul pa lta bur yongs su shes
151b7(khri brgyad): nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmi lam du rlom sems mi byed/ rmi lam bdag gi zhes bya bar rlom sem su mi byed cing / rmi lam gyi
151b8(khri brgyad): mtshan mar yang rlom sems su mi byed ci / sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa'i bdag gi zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul
152a1(khri brgyad): pa la rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa'i mtshan mar rlom sems su mi byed pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka byang chub
152a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa gal te gzugs rlom semasu mi byed/ gzugs bdag gi zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi
152a3(khri brgyad): byed/ gzugs la rlom sems su mi byed/ gzugs kyi mtshan mar yang rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam du rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam bdag gis zhes bya bar
152a4(khri brgyad): rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyi mtshan mar yang rlom semasu mi byed cing / sprul pa'i bar du rlom sem su mi byed/ sprul pa bdag
152a5(khri brgyad): gi rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa'i mtshan mar yang rlom sems su mi byed na/ rmi lam du yang rlom sems su mi byed// rmi lam
152a6(khri brgyad): du bdag gi zhes bya bar rlom semasu mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyi mtshan mar yang rlom sems su mi byed pa yin no// de bzhin du tshor ba dang /
152a7(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rlom semasu mi byed/ rnam par shes pa bdag gis zhes bya bar rlom semasu mi byed// rnam par shes pa yA/
152a8(khri brgyad): bdag gi zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam par shes pa la rlom sem su mi byed/ rnam par shes pa'i mtshan mar yang rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam pa thams cad
152b1(khri brgyad): mkhyen pi bar du yang rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag gi zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rlom
152b2(khri brgyad): sems su mi byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mtshan mar yang rlom sems su mi byed/ de rmi lam du yang rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam bdeg gi zhes bya ba
152b3(khri brgyad): rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyi mtshan mar yang rlom semasu mi byed cing / sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes bya bar rlom sems su
152b4(khri brgyad): mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa'i mtshan mar yang rlom semasu mi byed pa yin no// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'o
152b5(khri brgyad): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa dang / thabs bral ba dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul
152b6(khri brgyad): dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang / tshangs 'khor dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha'i bu gang dag ji snyed 'khod pa de dag tham
152b7(khri brgyad): cad lho'i can dan gyi phye ma dag thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su mngon par mthor zhing / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lpags nas/ bcog
152b8(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig du 'khod do// de nas sangs rgyas kyi rgyal po bzhi dang / brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang / gnas gtsang
153a1(khri brgyad): ma'i rigs kyi bar gyi lha'i bu rnams kyi/ shar phyogs na sangs rgyas stong rnam pa 'di ga nyid dang / ming 'di dag nyid kyis chos
153a2(khri brgyad): ston cing / sangs rgyas kyi mthus chos ston cing dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
153a3(khri brgyad): le'u 'di nyid yongs su zhu ba dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin sha stag gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid du yongs su zhu ba dag bsam par gyur to// de bzhin du
153a4(khri brgyad): lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / 'og dang / steng dang / phyogs mtshams kun du sang stong rnam pa 'di dag nyid dang / mang 'di dag nyid kyis ston cing / sangs
153a5(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi mthus dge slong rab 'byor ces bya bar sha stag gi shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid yongs su zhu ba dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin sha stag gis shes
153a6(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid yongs su zhu ba dag bsam par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
153a7(khri brgyad): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang / sa phyon
153a8(khri brgyad): 'di nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa nyid ston par 'gyur ro// gang dag bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la 'byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
153b1(khri brgyad): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ phyogs 'di nyid du shes rab kyi
153b2(khri brgyad): pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid ston par 'gyur ro// / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
153b3(khri brgyad): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ rnam pa gang dag
153b4(khri brgyad): dang rtags gang dag dang / mtshan ma gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ston par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la
153b5(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ gzugs rtag ces bya bar
153b6(khri brgyad): 'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyu ro// de bzhin du gzugs bde zhes bya ba dang sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / gzugs bdag ces bya ba dang bdag med ces
153b7(khri brgyad): bya ba dang / gzugs sdug ces bya ba dang mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston pa mi 'gyur ro// gzugs bcings zhes bya ba dang grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//
153b8(khri brgyad): de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba dang sdug
154a1(khri brgyad): bsngal zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba dang bdag med ces bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba dang mi
154a2(khri brgyad): sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rnam par shes pa bcings zhes bya ba dang grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzugs 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang /
154a3(khri brgyad): de ltar byung ba zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang /
154a4(khri brgyad): da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar chos
154a5(khri brgyad): ston par mi 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bcings zhes bya ba dang / grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyuraro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan
154a6(khri brgyad): pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
154a7(khri brgyad): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ji ltar chos ston par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs shin du rnam par dag go zhe
154a8(khri brgyad): shin du rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa shin du rnam par dag go/ zhes
154b1(khri brgyad): ston
154b2(khri brgyad): shin du rnam par dag pa'i chos par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin du rnam par shes pa zhes shin du rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par
154b3(khri brgyad): 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa na yongs su dag pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
154b4(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gzugs yongasu dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yong su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
154b5(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su dag pi
154b6(khri brgyad): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dka' yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na bdag yongs su dag pa'i slad du shes rab
154b7(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ ji ltar na tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du shes rab
154b8(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yong su dag pa slad du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
154b9(khri brgyad): yongasu dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /
155a1(khri brgyad): rnam par byang ba med pa ni gzugs yongasu dag pa lags/ rab 'byor tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par
155a2(khri brgyad): shes pa skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa yin// rab 'byor
155a3(khri brgyad): de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni/ rnam pa
155a4(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su dag pa yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor gzhan yang na mkha' yong su dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa
155a5(khri brgyad): yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na mkha' yongs su dag pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ rab 'byor
155a6(khri brgyad): namakha' la ni skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa phyir yong su dge ba ste/ rab 'byor na mkha' gos
155a7(khri brgyad): ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na mkha' gos pa ma mchis pa'i slad du
155a8(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor na mkha' gzung du med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
155b1(khri brgyad): pa yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na mkha' gzung du ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongasu dag pa lags/
155b2(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor na mkha' slu ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/
155b3(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na mkha' smra ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
155b4(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ brag ca gnyis kyi sgra ji lta ba de bzhin du rab 'byor na mkha' smra ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// rab
155b5(khri brgyad): 'byor na mkha' rab du brjod du med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na na mkha'
155b6(khri brgyad): rab du brjod du ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor na mkha' la ni rab
155b7(khri brgyad): du brjod pa gang yang med de/ de ltar na mkha' la ni rab du brjod pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongasu dag pa yin no// rab 'byor na mkha' dmigs
155b8(khri brgyad): med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongasu dag pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ na mkha' dam gsu ma mchis pa'i
156a1(khri brgyad): slad du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor na mkha'
156a2(khri brgyad): la ni ci yang dmig su med do// rab 'byor de ltar na mkha' dmig su med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yong su dag po yin no// rab 'byor gzugs shin du rnam par
156a3(khri brgyad): dag pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi
156a4(khri brgyad): pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa yong su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa shin du
156a5(khri brgyad): rnam par dag pa dmigs su med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pi shes rab kyi
156a6(khri brgyad): pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin du rnam par dag pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang /
156a7(khri brgyad): skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin//
156a8(khri brgyad): rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad shin du rnam par dag pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs
156b1(khri brgyad): pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yong su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor chos thams cad shin du rnam par dag pa dang / dmigs
156b2(khri brgyad): su med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs
156b3(khri brgyad): su dag pa yino// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar chos thams cad shin du rnam par dag pa lags/ dmigs su ma mchis pa dang / skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa
156b4(khri brgyad): ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongasasu dag pa lags/ bcom
156b5(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor tshe da sa dag kyi ma'i gyi/ yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi
156b6(khri brgyad): bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dang shos rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bapyid
156b7(khri brgyad): pa de la ni mig gi nang 'byung bar mi 'chu shako// da pa'i nang dang / sna'i nang dang / lce'i nang dang / lus kyi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur lagaso// yid kyi nang 'byung bar
156b8(khri brgyad): mi 'gyur lag so// yan lag ma tshang bar mi 'gyur lag so// lus ngal bar mi 'gyur lag so// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni bshis ngan du 'bum
157a1(khri brgyad): par mi 'gyur lag so// de bzhin du chos nyan par 'tshal ba'i lha stong phrag mang po dag kyang 'brang bar 'gyur lag so// rgyal chen
157a2(khri brgyad): bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar byi lba rnams kyang slad bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyur lagaso// gang na dam pa'i chos smra ba'i rigs kyi bu
157a3(khri brgyad): 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag tshes brgyad dang bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dag la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sme bar bgyid pa der lha'i tshegs mang po dag kyang 'du bar 'gyur
157a4(khri brgyad): lagaso// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di bsod nams mang du bskyed par 'gyur te/ bsod nams dpag du ma mchis pas
157a5(khri brgyad): byis mi khyab gzhal du ma mchis pa dag bskyed par 'gyur labaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi
157a6(khri brgyad): bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang tshes brgyad dang bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dag la lha'i 'khor gyi mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sla bar byed pa de ni bsod nams dpag
157a7(khri brgyad): du med grangs med pasam gyis mi khyab gzhal du med brjod du med pa dag kyang bskyed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi phyin pa
157a8(khri brgyad): 'di ni rin po che yin pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa rin po che 'di la rten nas/ sems can dmyal ba las mthar bar 'gyu / dung
157b1(khri brgyad): 'gro'i skye gnas las thar bar 'gyur ro// gshin rje'i 'jig rten las mthar bar 'gyur ro// mi dbul po las thar bar 'gyuraro// rgyal rigs shing sa la chen
157b2(khri brgyad): po lta bu rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// bram ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu rnams skye bar 'gyur ro// khyim bdag gi rigs che ning shing sa la chen po rnams su skye ba
157b3(khri brgyad): 'gyu ro// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams skye bar 'gyur ro// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i bar gyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// shes
157b4(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bskyed par byed pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa
157b5(khri brgyad): nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bskyed par byed pa yino// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
157b6(khri brgyad): 'di las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams rgya cher bskyed de/ de la rten nas rgyal rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu rnamasu yod pa dang / bram ze'i rigs shing sa la chen
157b7(khri brgyad): po lta bu rnams yod pa dang / khyim bdag gi rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu rnams yod pa dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum dang /
157b8(khri brgyad): 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod pa dang / tshangs pa mdun na 'don rnams yod pa dang / tshangs
158a1(khri brgyad): @ris dang tshangs 'khor dang / 'od chung dang / chad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge rlung dang / tshad med dge dang/
158a2(khri brgyad): dge rgyas dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / 'du shes med pa'i sems can rnams dang / shin du mthong dang / gya nom snang dang / mi gdung ba dang / 'og min gyi lha
158a3(khri brgyad): rnams dang / na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams yod pa
158a4(khri brgyad): dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'o ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang /
158a5(khri brgyad): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la bsam gtan bzhi yod pa dang / tshad med pa bzhi yod/ gzugs
158a6(khri brgyad): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yod pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang /
158a7(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhog pa rnams yod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang /
158a8(khri brgyad): stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams yod pa dang / nad stong pa nyid yod pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yod pa dang /
158b1(khri brgyad): stobs bcu yod pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bani dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod pa dang / rnam pa
158b2(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa'i bar du yod pa'i phyir te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las de dag la sogs pa'i chos rnams rgya cher ston pa bas na/ de'i phyir 'di
158b3(khri brgyad): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rin po che zhes bya ste/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la ni skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs
158b4(khri brgyad): pa'am/ rnam par byang ba 'am/ yongs su bzung ba 'am/ 'dor ba'i chos gang yang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gang dag skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/
158b5(khri brgyad): kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba 'am/ yongasu bzung ba 'am/ 'dor bar byas pa'i chos de dag med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha
158b6(khri brgyad): rol du phyin pa rin po che 'di la ni dge ba 'am/ mi dge ba'am/ zag pa dang / bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa 'am/ kha na ma tho ba dang / bcas pa dang / kha nam
158b7(khri brgyad): tho med pa 'am/ nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa 'am/ nyon mongs pa med pa 'am/ 'jig rten pa 'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa 'am/ 'dus byas sam/ 'dus
158b8(khri brgyad): ma byas kyi chos gang yang dmig su med do// rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni nor bu rin po che yin te/ rab 'byor pha rol du phyin pa rin po che de ni
159a1(khri brgyad): chos gang gis kyang mgos pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'di ltar gang gis gos par 'gyur ba'i chos de dmigs su med
159a2(khri brgyad): phyir te/ rab 'byor des na pha rol du phyin pa rin po che 'di ni gos pa med pa yin no// rab 'byor de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
159a3(khri brgyad): rol du phyin pa la spyod pa de ltar 'du shes par mi byed/ de ltar rnam par rtog par mi byed/ de ltar dmigs par mi byed/ de ltar spros par yang mi byed na/ shes
159a4(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol dri phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong ba yin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
159a5(khri brgyad): rnams la sti stang du byas pa dang / bla mar bya ba dang / ri mor bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'bre zhing / sangs rgyas kyi
159a6(khri brgyad): zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du song nas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha
159a7(khri brgyad): rol du phyin pa 'di ni chos gang yang thob par byed pa ma yin no// ston par byed pa ma yin no// 'dzin par byed pa yin/ byin par byed pa ma yin/ skyed par byed
159a8(khri brgyad): ba ma yin/ 'gog par byed pa ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa ma yin/ rnam par byang bar byed pa ma yin/ 'grib par byed pa ma yin// 'bol
159b1(khri brgyad): bar byed pa ma yin/ 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ong ba yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin no// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'dod
159b2(khri brgyad): pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' bar byed pa yang ma yin/ gnas par byed pa yang ma yin/ gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams las
159b3(khri brgyad): yang dag par 'da' bar byed pa yang ma yin/ gnas par byed pa yang ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yang
159b4(khri brgyad): ma yin/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sbyin par byed pa ma yin/ 'dor bar
159b5(khri brgyad): byed pa yang ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du sbyin par
159b6(khri brgyad): byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/ de bzhin du yang
159b7(khri brgyad): dag pa'i spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dor
159b8(khri brgyad): bar byed pa yang ma yin/ stobs bcu sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi
160a1(khri brgyad): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/ rgyun du zhugs
160a2(khri brgyad): pa'i 'bras bu sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra ba
160a3(khri brgyad): pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin no// shes rab kyi pha
160a4(khri brgyad): rol du phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams sbyin par byed pa yang ma
160a5(khri brgyad): yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/ sangs
160a6(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos rnams sbyin par byed pa yang me yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yino// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'dus byas 'dor bar byed pa
160a7(khri brgyad): yang ma yin/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung / chos kyi dbyings
160a8(khri brgyad): kyi tshul 'di ni gnas pa nyid de/ de de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing mngon par thugs su chud de/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing mngon
160b1(khri brgyad): par thugs su chud kyang bsrung ba dang / rnam par 'grel pa dang / rnam par byed pa dang / ston par mdzad pa'i phyir ro// de nas lha'i bu 'bum phrag rab tu mang po dag steng
160b2(khri brgyad): gi bar snang la 'khod pa ca co dang gzha 'don cing / lha'i me tog u pal dang / pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma dkar po dang / man dar ba dag gis gtor nas/ 'di
160b3(khri brgyad): skad du a la la 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo lan gnyis bskor ba 'di mthong ngo // zhes tshig su yang brjod do// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di bstan pa na/
160b4(khri brgyad): de nyid las lha'i bu stong phrag du ma dag gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
160b5(khri brgyad): rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni chos gang la yang 'jug pa 'am/ ldog par bya'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin
160b6(khri brgyad): bas/ rab 'byor 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor banyis pa yang ma yin/ gcig pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe shes
160b7(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di chos gang yang 'jug par bgyi 'am/ ldog par gyi'am slad du nye bar gnas pa ma lags pa'i dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang lag/
160b8(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas stong ngo // de bzhin du bsam gtan dang / brtson
161a1(khri brgyad): 'grus dang / bzod pa dang / rdul khrims dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pas stong ngo // nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyi stong ngo //
161a2(khri brgyad): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bar ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bar gyis stong ngo // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ngo // de bzhin
161a3(khri brgyad): du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams ni lam rnams kyis stong ngo // stob
161a4(khri brgyad): bcu ni stobs bcus stong ngo // mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
161a5(khri brgyad): 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ngo // rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong ngo // de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi
161a6(khri brgyad): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stong ngo // rab 'byor
161a7(khri brgyad): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i dri ni che ba lags te/ chos thams cad kyang chos thams cad
161a8(khri brgyad): kyi rang bzhin gyis stong la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la rten nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
161b1(khri brgyad): nub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya yang / chos gang yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis shing / chos kyi 'khor lo yang bskor la/ chos gang 'jug par
161b2(khri brgyad): bgyid pa 'am/ ldog par bgyid pa yang ma mchis te/ chos gang yang yongs su mthong ba ma mchis le/ chos gang yang yongs su mthong ba ma mchis lag so// de ci'i
161b3(khri brgyad): slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar gang 'jug pa 'am ldog pa'i chos de dmig su ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/ 'di ltar chos thams cad gtan mngon par grub pa lags pas/ stong pa
161b4(khri brgyad): nyid ni 'jug par bi byas pa 'am/ ldog par bgyid pa ma lags la/ mtshan ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa yang 'jug par bgyid pa 'am// ldog par bgyid
161b5(khri brgyad): ba ma lag so// de ltar na gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bstan pa dang / rab tu bstan pa dang / brjod pa dang / bdag pa dang / 'jug pa dang / rnam par 'grel/
161b6(khri brgyad): ba dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / smos pa dang / gsal bar bgyid pa dang / yang dag par rab tu ston pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa lag so//
161b7(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de yang sus kyang ma bstan/ sus kyang ma bzung lag so// gang sus kyang ma bstan/ sus kyang ma bzung ba de ni/ sus kyang mngon
161b8(khri brgyad): sum ma bgyis pa lags so// gang sus kyang ma bstan sus kyang ma bzung / sus kyang mngon sum du ma bgyis pa de la ni/ yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa su yang ma
162a1(khri brgyad): mchis te/ chos bstan pa 'di la su yang sbyin gnas su 'gyur ba yang ma mchis lagaso// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
162a2(khri brgyad): khri brgyad stong pa las gnas med pa'i le'u zhes bya ste// / sum bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan
162a3(khri brgyad): 'ab rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni ma mchis pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das
162a4(khri brgyad): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor na mkha' med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mnyam pa
162a5(khri brgyad): nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gla sol pa/
162a6(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni dben pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
162a7(khri brgyad): nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rdzib ma mchis pa lags so// bcom
162a8(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad dmigasu med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
162b1(khri brgyad): pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni gzhi ma mchis pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ming med pa dang / lus med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/
162b2(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni na mkha' lta bu lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbugs phyi nang
162b3(khri brgyad): du rgyu ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni brjod du ma mchis
162b4(khri brgyad): pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par spyod pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/
162b5(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni ming ma mchis pa la gos so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshor ba dang / 'du
162b6(khri brgyad): shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i phung po dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
162b7(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'gro ba ma mchis pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro// rab
162b8(khri brgyad): 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mi 'phrogs pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
163a1(khri brgyad): chos thams cad bzung du med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
163a2(khri brgyad): du phyin pa 'di ni zab pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad shin du byang shing zad pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
163a3(khri brgyad): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni skye ba ma mchis pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad skye ba ma mchis pa dang
163a4(khri brgyad): 'gag pa med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni byed pa ma mchis pa
163a5(khri brgyad): lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byed pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
163a6(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni shes pa po ma mchis pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shes pa po dmigasu med pa'i phyir ro//
163a7(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'pho ba ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das
163a8(khri brgyad): kyis bka' stsal pa/ skye ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin
163b1(khri brgyad): pa 'di ni 'jigs pa ma mchis pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'jigs pa med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/
163b2(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rmi lam lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rmi lam rmis pa dmigasu
163b3(khri brgyad): med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni brag cha lta bu lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
163b4(khri brgyad): pa/ sgra'i brjod pa dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mig
163b5(khri brgyad): yor lta bu yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs brnyan dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
163b6(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni smig sgyu lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chu 'bab pa dmigs su med pa phyir ro// rab
163b7(khri brgyad): 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni sgyu ma lta bu lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtshan ma
163b8(khri brgyad): dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni gti mug ma mchis pa lag so// bco
164a1(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma rigs pa'i mun pa dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
164a2(khri brgyad): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa lag so// 1/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun nas nyon
164a3(khri brgyad): mongs pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rnam par byang ba ma mchis
164a4(khri brgyad): pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa yod pa rim dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di
164a5(khri brgyad): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di gnas ma mchis pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad dmig su med pa'i phyir ro//
164a6(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni dmigs su ma mchis pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
164a7(khri brgyad): gnas dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni spros pa ma mchis
164a8(khri brgyad): pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ spros pa thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di/
164b1(khri brgyad): ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rlom sems ma mchis pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rlom sems thams cad yang dag
164b2(khri brgyad): par bcom pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni g.yo ba ma mchis pa lag so// bco
164b3(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos kyi dbyangs gnas pa nyid kyi phyiraro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'dra 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
164b4(khri brgyad): du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'dod chags dang bral ba lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad ma nor ba de bzhin nyid du mngon par
164b5(khri brgyad): rdzogs par byed pa phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni kun nas ldang ba ma ma
164b6(khri brgyad): pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad rnam par rtog pa med nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di
164b7(khri brgyad): lha ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni zhi ba ma mchis pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med cing dmig su
164b8(khri brgyad): med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'dod chags ma mchis pa lag so// ba
165a1(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dod chags kyi mtshan ma dmigasu med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
165a2(khri brgyad): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni zhe sdang ma mchis pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhe sdang yod pa
165a3(khri brgyad): ma yin pa'i phyir ro// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa// bam po sum bcu pa'o
165a4(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni gti mug ma mchis pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis ba
165a5(khri brgyad): bstsal pa/ gti mug mun pa rnam par sel ba nyid kyis phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di
165a6(khri brgyad): ni nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yongs su rtog pa med pa nyid kyis phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/
165a7(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni sems can ma mchis pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can
165a8(khri brgyad): dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni tshad ma mchis pa lag so//
165b1(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kun nas ldang ba med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
165b2(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtha' gnyis su ma mchis pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' dmigasu med
165b3(khri brgyad): kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni ma 'dres pa lag so// bco
165b4(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'dres pa med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyi sol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
165b5(khri brgyad): du phyin pa 'di ni naganog ma mchis pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyiraro// rab 'byor gyis
165b6(khri brgyad): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rnam par mi rtog pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
165b7(khri brgyad): rnam par mi rtogs pa dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni chad ma mchis pa lag so//
165b8(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad chang med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni
166a1(khri brgyad): na mkha' lta bu lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad nam mkha' lta bu chags pa med pa'i phyiraro// rab 'byor gyis
166a2(khri brgyad): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mi rtag pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ chos thams cad 'jig pa med pa'i
166a3(khri brgyad): phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni sdug bsngal ba lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos
166a4(khri brgyad): thams cad lhag par chags pa bya ba'i 'os ma yin pa'i phyir// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa
166a5(khri brgyad): 'di ni bdag ma mchis pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyiraro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
166a6(khri brgyad): 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dmig su
166a7(khri brgyad): med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtshan nyid ma mchis pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
166a8(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni
166b1(khri brgyad): nang stong pa nyid lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nang gi chos thams cad dmig su med pa'i phyiraro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di
166b2(khri brgyad): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi'i chos thams cad dmig su med pa'i
166b3(khri brgyad): phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid lag so// bcom ldan 'das
166b4(khri brgyad): kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi nang gi chos rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol
166b5(khri brgyad): du phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmigasu med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/
166b6(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chen po stong pa
166b7(khri brgyad): nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid lags so//
166b8(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab
167a1(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus byas
167a2(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong
167a3(khri brgyad): pa nyid lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
167a4(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' les 'das pa stong pa
167a5(khri brgyad): nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma
167a6(khri brgyad): med pa stong pa nyid lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/
167a7(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
167a8(khri brgyad): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa
167b1(khri brgyad): 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis
167b2(khri brgyad): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
167b3(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dmigasu med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du
167b4(khri brgyad): phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir
167b5(khri brgyad): ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni dmigs pa stong pa nyid lag so//
167b6(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dmigasu med pa'i phyiraro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
167b7(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid
167b8(khri brgyad): dmigs su med pa'i phyiraro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni de nyid stong
168a1(khri brgyad): pa nyid lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis
168a2(khri brgyad): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
168a3(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
168a4(khri brgyad): rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ lus dang / tshor ba dang / sems dang chos dmig
168a5(khri brgyad): su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di yang dag pa'i spong ba lag so// /
168a6(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos rnams dmig su med pa phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
168a7(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi nang pa bzhi dmigs med pa'i phyir//
168a8(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni dbang po lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
168b1(khri brgyad): stsal pa/ dbang po lnga dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni
168b2(khri brgyad): stobs lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stobs lnga dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
168b3(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni byang chub kyi yan lags lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dmigs su med
168b4(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyis pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni lam lags so// bcom ldan
168b5(khri brgyad): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yan lag brgyad pa dmigasu med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
168b6(khri brgyad): du byin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lta bar gyur pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis
168b7(khri brgyad): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtshan ma mchis pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
168b8(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ rnam par rtog pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol
169a1(khri brgyad): du byin pa 'di ni smon pa ma mchis pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ smon lam dmigasu med pa'i phyir ro//
169a2(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad lag so// bcom ldan 'das
169a3(khri brgyad): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dmigasu med pa'i phyiraro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin par
169a4(khri brgyad): rol du phyin pa 'di ni snyoms par 'jug pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dmigs su med pI
169a5(khri brgyad): phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'phags pa'i bden pa lagasaso//
169a6(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung dang / 'og pa dang lam dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
169a7(khri brgyad): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni sbyin pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ser sna dmigs su med pa'i phyir//
169a8(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni tshul khrims lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
169b1(khri brgyad): stsal pa/ 'chal pa'i tshul khrims dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pa
169b2(khri brgyad): rol du phyin pa 'di ni bzod pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnod sems dmigasu med pa'i phyir// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom
169b3(khri brgyad): ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni brtson 'grus lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ le lo dmig su med
169b4(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni bsam gtan lagaso//
169b5(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ g.yeng ba dmigasu med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol
169b6(khri brgyad): du phyin pa 'di ni shes rab lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'chal ba'i shes rab dmigasu med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/
169b7(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'dini stobs bcu lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams
169b8(khri brgyad): cad kyi rnam pa thams cad dmigs su med pa phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin
171a1(khri brgyad): pa 'di ni mi 'jigs pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid zhum
171a2(khri brgyad): pa med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni so so yang dag
171a3(khri brgyad): pa'i rig pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thams cad du ye shes chags pa med cing thogs pa med pa'i phyir ro// rab
171a4(khri brgyad): 'byor gyis pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni snying rje chen po lags so// bcom
171a5(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su mi stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
171a6(khri brgyad): 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyis chos ma 'dres pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
171a7(khri brgyad): stsal pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol
171a8(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa lags so// bcom
171b1(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ brjod pa thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/
171b2(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rang byung lag so// bcom ldan 'das
171b3(khri brgyad): kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/
171b4(khri brgyad): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas logs so// bcom lda/
171b5(khri brgyad): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i phyir ro// shes
171b6(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las//
171b7(khri brgyad): dmig su med pa'i le'u zhes bya ste sum bcu brgyad pa'o
172a1(khri brgyad): / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di sum du sems te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gi/ rna lam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
172a2(khri brgyad): grag pa de dag kyang sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa yin la/ gang dag rna lam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di grag par gyur pa 'di dag kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa las
172a3(khri brgyad): dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed cing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa yin na/ gang dag 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang /
172a4(khri brgyad): bzungs zhing bcangs la/ klags shing kun chub par byas nas kyang / de bzhin nyid du sgrub par byed pa dag lta smos kyang ci dgos/ rigs kyi bu 'ami rags kyi bu mo gang dag
172a5(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / bzung zhing bcang la/ klags shing kun chub par byas nas/ de bzhi
172a6(khri brgyad): nyid du sgrub par byed pa de dag gis ni sangs rgyas mang po dag la bsnyen bkur byas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos
172a7(khri brgyad): nas kyang mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang par mi 'gyur ba de dag gis ni sngon gyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la yang yongs su
172a8(khri brgyad): zhu ba byas pa yin no// gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas kyang mi skrag mi dang zhing dngang par mi 'gyur ba de dag ga bskal pa bye ba phrag mang
172b1(khri brgyad): po dag nas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / rdul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/
172b2(khri brgyad): yin no snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha
172b3(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos mi skrag mi dang zhing dngang par mi 'gyur la/ 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yang brtson par
172b4(khri brgyad): bgyid pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ji ltar bzung bar bgyi lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/
172b5(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab pa lags te/ sngon shes rab kyi pha rol gyis pha rol du phyin pa drug po de dag la ma spyad pa dag gis/
172b6(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par rngo ma thog pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
172b7(khri brgyad): 'di spong bar sems pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/ sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di spangs lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/
