265a4(khri brgyad): kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung bar mi 'gyur/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ mir skyes nas lo brgya nyi shu lon pa rgas shing logs par 'gyur ba zhig yod//
265a5(khri brgyad): de'i lus la rung las gyur pa 'am/ 'khris pa las gyur pa'am/ bad kan las gyur pa 'am/ 'dus pa las gyur pa'i nad 'ga' byung na/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyed/
265a6(khri brgyad): du sems/ ci mi de rang dgar ldang nus pa'i mthu dang ldan nam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'bye
265a7(khri brgyad): ci mi ldan ngam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das mi de ni khri las ldang ba'i rngo thogs tu lags kyang / de ni rgas pa dang bro nad de dag gis khams dmas
265a8(khri brgyad): bas dpag tshad gcig gis bar ram/ dpag tshad gnyis kyi bar du mchis pa'i mthu yang ma mchis te/ khri de las ldang ba'i rngo thog tu lags kyang / mchis
265b1(khri brgyad): ba'i rngo ni mi thogs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par
265b2(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems kyi phyir dad pa yang yod/ bzod pa yang yod/ dga' ba yang yod/ dang ba yang yod/ lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yod/ 'dod pa
265b3(khri brgyad): yang yod/ mos pa yang yod/ gtong ba yang yod/ brtson pa yang yod/ mi gtong ba yang yod du zin kyang / de shes rab kyi pha rol du byin pas yongs su ma
265b4(khri brgyad): zin la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis yongasu ma zin na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
265b5(khri brgyad): pas yongasu ma zin pa dang / thams mkhas pas yongasu ma zin pa'i phyir te/ bar ma dor lam du nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar 'gyuraro// /
265b6(khri brgyad): rab 'byor 'di lte ste dper na mi skyes nas brgya nyi shu lon pas rgas shing khogs la gdugs par gyur pa de la/ rlung las gyur pa 'am/ mkhris po las gyur pa
265b7(khri brgyad): 'am/ bad kan las gyur pa 'am/ 'dus pa las gyur pa'i nad kyi nyams dmas pa de zhing / mi stobs dang ldan pa gnyis mtshan g.yas g.yon nas rten te
265b8(khri brgyad): theg nas khri de las spang ste/ 'di skad du kye ma khe bo cag gagis rten de 'azung gi gang du 'dod pa dang gar dga' bar song shig dang / gnas der ma byin gyi bar
266a1(khri brgyad): du bar mdor 'gyel bar mi 'gyur ro// zhes zer ba de bzhin du rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang
266a2(khri brgyad): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa yang yod/ bzod pa yang yod/ dga' ba yang yod/ dang ba yang yod/ lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yod
266a3(khri brgyad): 'dod pa yang yod ma so bas yang yod brtson pa mi tong ba yang yod la/ de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas kyang yongasu zin cing thabs mkhas pas kyang yongasu
266a4(khri brgyad): zin na ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bar ma dor ldog par ma 'gyur bar rig par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
266a5(khri brgyad): de ni 'di lte ste/ bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi gnas de thob pa'i mthu dang ldan pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rig
266a6(khri brgyad): kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa dag/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas yongasu ma zin cing / thabs la mkhas pa
266a7(khri brgyad): yongasu ma zin la/ kan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang ltung bar 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod
266a8(khri brgyad): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la don 'di 'dra bar sems la legaso legs so// rab 'byor 'di la byang chub
266b1(khri brgyad): sems dpa'i thog ma kho nar sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa na/ ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin par ltung ba'i sems kyi rgyud kyis sbyin pa sbyin par byed cing /
266b2(khri brgyad): tshul khrims gang bsrungs pa dang / bzod pa gang skom pa dang / bcom 'grus gang brtsom pa dang / bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
266b3(khri brgyad): shes rab sgom pa de yang ngar 'dzin pa dang / da yir 'dzin par ltung ba'i sems kyi shes rab sgom par byed do// de sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa na/ 'di snyam du
266b4(khri brgyad): sems te/ bdag gis sbyin pa sbyin no// sbyin pa 'di ni sbyin par bya'o// bdag ni sbyin pa dang ldan no// bdag ni tshul khrims bsrungaso// bdag gis
266b5(khri brgyad): tshul khrims bsgoms par bya'o// bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan no// bdag gas bzod par byo'o// bdag bzod pa sgom mo// bgra ni bzod pa dang
266b6(khri brgyad): ldan no// bdag ni brtson 'grus brtsams so// bdag gis brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o// bdag ni brtson 'grus dang ldan no// bdag ni bsam
266b7(khri brgyad): gzhan la snyoms par 'jug go// bdag gis bsam gtan bsgom par bya'o// bdag ni bsam gtan dang ldan no// bdag gis shes rab sgom mo//
266b8(khri brgyad): dag gis shes rab 'di sgom par bya'o// bdag ni shes rab dang ldan no snyam ste/ de sbyin pa des rlom sems su byed do/ bdag gi snyam du sbyin su rlom
267a1(khri brgyad): sems su byed do// de bzhin du tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gzhan dang / shes rab kyi
267a2(khri brgyad): rlom semasu byed de/ shes rab kyi rlom sems su byed do// bdag gis shes rab bo skams du rlom sems su byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sbyin pa'i
267a3(khri brgyad): pha rol du byin pa la ni rnam par rtog pa de dag med de/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni phathar phyin pa yin pa'i phyir ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la ni rnam
267a4(khri brgyad): par rtog pa de dag med do// bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi
267a5(khri brgyad): pha rol du phyin pa la yang de bzhin rnam par rtog pa mi skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni pha mthar phyin pa yin na/ byang chub sems dpa'i
267a6(khri brgyad): theg pa pa des ni pha mtha' yang mi shes/ pha rol yang mi shes pa'i phyir te/ de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol ro du phyin pas yongasu ma zin cing / tshul khrims kyis pa
267a7(khri brgyad): rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du
267a8(khri brgyad): phyin pas yongs su ma zin la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gyis par yongasu ma zin pas nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar
267b1(khri brgyad): 'gyur te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa pa nyid nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa
267b2(khri brgyad): ba ji ltar thams la mi mkhas pa yin zhes na/ rab 'byor 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i thegs pa ji ltar thabs la mi mkhas
267b3(khri brgyad): ba thog mar kho nar sbyin pa sbyin par byed cing / thabs la mi mkhas pas tshul khrims bsrungs par byed/ thabs la mi mkhas pas bzod pa bsgom par byed/
267b4(khri brgyad): zabs la mi mkhas pas brtson 'grus brtsom par byed/ thabs la mi mkhas pas gsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug par byed/ thabs la mi mkhas pas
267b5(khri brgyad): shes rab sgoms par byed cing / 'di ji snyams du sems te/ bdag gis sbyin pa sbyin no// 'di sbyin par bya'o// sbyin pa 'di sbyin par bya'o// bdag
267b6(khri brgyad): gis tshul khrims bsrung ngo // bdag gis bzod pa sgom mo// bdag gi brtson 'grus brtsams so// bdag gis bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug par
267b7(khri brgyad): bya'o// bdag gis shes rab sgom par bya'o// shes rab 'di sgom par bya'o// snyam te/ de sbyin pa de rloms sems su byed/ sbyin pas rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni
267b8(khri brgyad): sbyin pa po snyam du rlom sems su byed do// de tshul khrims brlom sems su byed/ tshul khrims kyis rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o snyam du
268a1(khri brgyad): du rlom sems su byed do// bzod pa rlom sems su byed do// bzod pas rlom sems su byed/ bye dag ni bzod pa dang ldan
268a2(khri brgyad): ba'o// snyam du rlom sems su byed do// brtson 'grus rlom sems su byed do/ brtson 'grus kyi rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'o/
268a3(khri brgyad): snyam do sems su byed do// bsam gtan rlom sems su byed/ bsam gtan gyis rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni bsam gtan dang ldan pa'o snyam du
268a4(khri brgyad): rlom sems su byed do// shes rab rlom sems su byed/ shes rab kyis rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni shes rab dang ldan pa'o snyam du rlom sems
268a5(khri brgyad): su byed do// de'i ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ji ltar rnams par rtogs pa bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol du byin pa la rnam par rtog pa de dag med pa'i phyiraro// de ci'i
268a6(khri brgyad): phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa de ni pha mthar smin pa yin la/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i phyiraro//
268a7(khri brgyad): ji ltar rnam par rtog pa bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la rnam par rtog pa de dag med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du
268a8(khri brgyad): byin pa de ni ba mthar byin na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa des ni ba mtha' yang mi shes/ pha rol yang mi shes/
268b1(khri brgyad): ba'i phyir ro// de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pas yongasu ma zin pa nas/ snga ma bzhin du sbyin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i bar yongasu ma zin la//
268b2(khri brgyad): nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar 'gyur zhing / rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab
268b3(khri brgyad): rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pas yongs su ma zin pas na/ nyan
268b4(khri brgyad): thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
268b5(khri brgyad): dang / thabs la mkhas pas yongs su zin la/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
268b6(khri brgyad): thob par 'gyur zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thog ma kho nar sbyin pa sbyin na/ ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa'i sem
268b7(khri brgyad): kyi sbyin pa sbyin par mi byed cing / shes rab kyi bar du sgom par mi byed de/ de 'di snyam du bdag gis sbyin pa sbyin no// sbyin pa 'di sbyin par bya'o// 'di la sbyin pa
268b8(khri brgyad): sbyin par bya'o snyam du rlom sems su mi byed do zhes/ shes rab kyi pha rol du byin pa'i bar du yang de bzhin du sbyar te/ de sbyin pa la rlom sems su mi byed//
269a1(khri brgyad): sbyin pas rlom sems su mi byed/ bdag gis sbyin pa'o// snyam du rlom sems su mi byed/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ shes rab
269a2(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ shes rab kyi brlom sems su
269a3(khri brgyad): mi byed/ bdag gis shes rab po snyam du rlom sems su mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la ni gang gis rlom semasu
269a4(khri brgyad): byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du bya'i bar du gang gas kyang rlom semasu mi byed pa'i rnam par rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro//
269a5(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste dper na sbyin pa'i pha rol du byin pa de dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i bar du pha mthar sa phyin pa yin la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
269a6(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po de yang mtha' yas yang shes/ pha rol yang shes te/ rlom sems su mi byed pa de ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pas yongasu zin pa yin no//
269a7(khri brgyad): tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
269a8(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas yongasu zin cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis yongasu zin te/ nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
269b1(khri brgyad): ltung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyuraro// rab 'byor de lur na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
269b2(khri brgyad): pha rol du phyin pa las yongasu zin cing / de bzhin du thabs la mkhas pas yongasu zin te/ nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung bar mi 'gyur ro// /
269b3(khri brgyad): nag po'i phyogs la ji lta bzhin du/ dkar po'i phyogs thams cad la yang de bzhin du spar bar bya'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa khri brgyad stong
269b4(khri brgyad): ba las/ gru'i le'u zhes bya te bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// // 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa// bam po sum bcu rtsa lnga pa'o//
269b5(khri brgyad): / de skad ces bka' bskul ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// dbacom ldan 'das las
269b6(khri brgyad): dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la ji ltar bslab par gyi/ bsam gzhan gyi pha rol du byin pa
269b7(khri brgyad): dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la ji
269b8(khri brgyad): lhar bslang bar gyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes kyi pha
270a1(khri brgyad): rol du phyin pa lab slob par 'dod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /
270a2(khri brgyad): bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la slob par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
270a3(khri brgyad): 'di ston pa gang yin pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag la bsnyen bkur bya'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i bar la srab par 'dod pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol
270a4(khri brgyad): du phyin pa ston pa'i dge ba'i gshes gnyen dag la sten par bya/ bsnyen bkur bya'o// de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ston te/ rigs kyi bu khyod
270a5(khri brgyad): tshur shog/ khyod kyis sbyin pa gang dang gang sbyin pa de dag thams cad/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu sngos shig/ rigs kyi bu tshur
270a6(khri brgyad): shog khyod kyi tshul khrims gang dang gang bsrung ba dang / bzod pa sgom pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsom pa dang / bsam gzhan la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
270a7(khri brgyad): shes rab sgom pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu sngos la/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
270a8(khri brgyad): ba'i byang chub gzugs las rtogs par ma byed cig/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du bye'i rnams dang / rnam par shes pa las rtog par mi byed cig/
270b1(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa las rtogs par ma byed cig/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang /
270b2(khri brgyad): brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la rtog pa ma byed cig/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi
270b3(khri brgyad): bar dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams las rtogs par ma byed cig/ yang dag pa'i spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang /
270b4(khri brgyad): byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams las tog par ma byed cig/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pas
270b5(khri brgyad): bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyis chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad las rtog par ma byed cig/ rig kyi bu khyod bla na med pa yang
270b6(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang rtog par ma byed cig/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la yang rtog par ma byed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na//
270b7(khri brgyad): gzugs la mi rtog na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du thob par 'gyur zhing / tshor ba dang / 'das shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la
270b8(khri brgyad): mi rtog na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin
271a1(khri brgyad): ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
271a2(khri brgyad): ba la mi rtog/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid spong kyi bar la mi rtog/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mi rtog
271a3(khri brgyad): yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam mi rtog/ mngon par shes pa
271a4(khri brgyad): rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jig pa rnams dang / so so yangs dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la
271a5(khri brgyad): rta mi rtogs na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du thob par 'gyur ba'i phyiraro// rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa
271a6(khri brgyad): na/ gzugs la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs ni 'dod pa med pa yin pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu khyod tshor ba dang / 'du
271a7(khri brgyad): shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i bar la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang /
271a8(khri brgyad): bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ nang stong pa
271b1(khri brgyad): nyid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la 'dod
271b2(khri brgyad): ba ma skyed cig/ yA dag pa'i spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam gyis
271b3(khri brgyad): bar la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs
271b4(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ rigs kyi bu khyod rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang 'dod pa ma skyed cig de ci'i phyir
271b5(khri brgyad): zhe na/ rigs kyi bu rnams dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni 'dod pa med cing 'dod par bya ba ma yin po'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu khyod rgyun du zhugs pa'i
271b6(khri brgyad): 'bras bu la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ lan cig phyir ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub la 'dod
271b7(khri brgyad): pa ma skyed cig/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na rigs kyi bu byang chub ni 'dod pa med phyir ro// de ci'i
271b8(khri brgyad): phyir zhe na rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro zhes rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems
273a1(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po gang dag chos thams cad rang gis mtshan nyid spong ba la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyen
273a2(khri brgyad): zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa'i tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de dag ni dka' bgyi ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
273a3(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag chos thams cad rang gis mtshan nyid kyis
273a4(khri brgyad): spong ba la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon du gnyer zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa dag ni bka' ba byed
273a5(khri brgyad): ba yin no// rab 'byor 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang / rmi lam lta bur shes nas bla na med pa yang dag
273a6(khri brgyad): par rdzogs pa'i chub la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni 'jig rten la phan pa dang / bde ba'i
273a7(khri brgyad): phyir yang dag par zhugs pa yin te/ bdag 'jig rten gyi skyob par gyur cig ces bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa
273a8(khri brgyad): yin no// 'jig rten gyis skyangs su gyur cig/ 'jig rten gyi rgya gnas dang / 'jig rten gyi gapung gnyen dang / 'jig rten gyi gling dang / 'jig rten gyi yongasu
273b1(khri brgyad): 'dren pa dang / 'jig rten gyi rten du gyur cig ces/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa yin/ rab 'byor byang chub
273b2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ji ltar 'jig rten la phan pa'i phyir yang dag par zhugs pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
273b3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems rnams 'gro ba lnga las yongasu 'grol bar byas nas mya ngan las 'das pa/ 'jigs pa med pa bde ba'i thang la 'god par
273b4(khri brgyad): byed de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
273b5(khri brgyad): pa rnams/ 'jig rten la phan pa'i phyir yang dag par zhags pa yin no// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ji ltar 'jig
273b6(khri brgyad): rten la bde ba'i phyir yang zhugs pa yin no// rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
273b7(khri brgyad): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa rnams kyis sems can rnams sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las grol
273b8(khri brgyad): bar bar byas nas/ mya ngan las 'das pa 'jigs pa med pa/ bde ba'i thang la 'god par byed de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
274a1(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po rnams/ 'jig rten la bde ba'i phyir yang dag par zhugs pa yin no// rab 'byor byang chub sems
274a2(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod rnams/ ji ltar 'jig
274a3(khri brgyad): rten gyi skyob pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
274a4(khri brgyad): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyas par 'dod pa rnams kyis ji ltar 'jig rten gyi skyob pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
274a5(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'dod pa rnams kyis/ 'dod pa yod pa'i sdug
274a6(khri brgyad): bsngal gang yin pa de dag las sems can rnams skyed cing de dag spang ba'i phyir chos ston te/ de dag gis chos de thos nas rim gyis theg pa
274a7(khri brgyad): gsum po dag gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur te/ rab 'byor 'di ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang
274a8(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa rnams/ ji ltar 'jig rten gyi skyabs yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di
274b1(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'dod pa rnams kyis//
274b2(khri brgyad): sems can rnams skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang /
274b3(khri brgyad): 'khrug pa'i chos can rnams/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi
274b4(khri brgyad): bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su grol bar byed la/ yongs su bkrol nas/ phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu mya
274b5(khri brgyad): ngan la 'da' bar byed de/ rab 'byor de lhur byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten gyi skabs yin no// rang 'byor byang chub
274b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ji ltar 'jig rten gyi gnas yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
274b7(khri brgyad): chos thams cad 'dri ba med pa'i phyir chos ston te/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i kyang
274b8(khri brgyad): chung sems mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa rnams 'jig rten pa'i gnas yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol
275a1(khri brgyad): pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar chos thams cad 'dre ba ma mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzug
275a2(khri brgyad): kyi 'dre ba med pa de ni gzugs kyi 'brel ba yin te/ de ni gzugs kyi skye ba med pa yin no// gzugs kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs kyis 'gag
275a3(khri brgyad): pa med pa te/ de ni gzugs kyi 'dren pa yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med
275a4(khri brgyad): ba gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa'i 'dren pa med pa yin te/ de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yang sbyar bar bya'o// rab 'byor de ltar
275a5(khri brgyad): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa rnams chos thams cad 'dre ba med
275a6(khri brgyad): par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang
275a7(khri brgyad): rgya bar 'dod pa rnams/ ji ltar 'jig rten gyi dpung gnyen zhes na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams/ sems can rnams la 'di skad du chos
275a8(khri brgyad): ston te/ gzugs kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni//
275b1(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa ma yin no// de bzhin sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no zhes
275b2(khri brgyad): chos ston te/ rab 'byor gzugs ji lta ba bzhin du chos thams cad kyang de bzhin no// rab 'byor gyi gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad gzugs ji
275b3(khri brgyad): lta ba bzhin lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa nyid du mi 'gyur lags so//
275b4(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa ci yang ma mchis lags/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam
275b5(khri brgyad): par shes pa ci bya yang ma mchis te/ de bzhin du 'di ni gzugs so// 'di ni tshor ba dang / 'di ni 'du shes so// 'di 'du byed rnams dang / 'di ni rnam par shes pa'o/
275b6(khri brgyad): zhes bgyi ba dang / 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do zhes bgyi ba'i bar du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis bar gyi pha rol du/ rnam par rtog pa ci yang
275b7(khri brgyad): ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa ying med la/ rnams pa mkhyen pa nyid kyi
275b8(khri brgyad): bar gyi pha rol na/ rnam par rtog pa ci yang med de/ rab 'byor 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos de lta bu dag la nges par sems
277a1(khri brgyad): shing / zhum par yang mi 'gyur la/ de ltar chos de dag mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar bya'o snyam ste/ de ltar na bla na med pa yang
277a2(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ chos 'di dag ni 'di ltar zhi ba'o// 'di ltar gya nom pa zhes ston par byed pa ni dka' ba
277a3(khri brgyad): byed pa yin te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par rgya bar 'dod
277a4(khri brgyad): ba rnams/ 'jig rten gyi dpung gnyen yin no// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
277a5(khri brgyad): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas na/ 'ji ltar 'jig rten gyi gling du 'gyur zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di lha ste dper na chu klung chen po rnams sems/ rgya mtsho chen po
277a6(khri brgyad): dag nas phyogs gang dag chus yongs su chod pa med pa de dag ni gling zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du gzugs ni sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' yongasu chad
277a7(khri brgyad): ba'o// rab 'byor tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i yongs su chad pa'o// rnam pa thams
277a8(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' yongasu chad pa'o// rab 'byor sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma mtha' yongasu chad pa de dag gis//
277b1(khri brgyad): chos thams cad yongs su chad pa'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha'i yongs su chad pa gang gis pa de ni 'di lta ste stong pa nyid dang
277b2(khri brgyad): dmigs su med pa dang / lam chad pa dang / sred pa zad pa dang / lhag ma med pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'gog pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa yin
277b3(khri brgyad): de/ de ni zhi ba'o// de ni gya nom pa'o// da ni ji lta ba'i bdag nyid yin te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis/ bla na med
277b4(khri brgyad): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ chos thams cad sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa ston pa ni
277b5(khri brgyad): 'jig rten gyi gling yin no// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyas nas/ 'jig rten yongs su
277b6(khri brgyad): 'dren par 'gyur zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon ji/ bar rdzogs par
277b7(khri brgyad): 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa rnams/ sems can ris la snying rje chen po skyed nas/ gzugs skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med
277b8(khri brgyad): ba dang / rnam par byed pa med par chos ston cing 'tshed/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med
278a1(khri brgyad): dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med par chos smon ste/ de bzhin du pha rol du phyin pa thams cad
278a2(khri brgyad): dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams/ dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
278a3(khri brgyad): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa
278a4(khri brgyad): dang / rnam pa thams ca byang ba med par chos ston cing 'chad do// rang byang chub skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam pa
278a5(khri brgyad): byang ba med par chos ston cing 'chad do// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par
278a6(khri brgyad): byang ba med par chos ston cing 'chad do// de bzhin du len cig phyin 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid skye ba med pa dang /
278a7(khri brgyad): 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med par chos ston cing 'chad do// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
278a8(khri brgyad): chen po rnam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can rnams kyi yongs su 'dren par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor
278b1(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ ji ltar sems can rnam/
278b2(khri brgyad): kyi rten du 'gyur zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
278b3(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas nas/ gzugs ni na mkha'i tshul can no zhes chos ston cing 'chad do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni
278b4(khri brgyad): na mkha'i tshul can no zhes sems can rnams la chos ston cing 'chad do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du na mkha' tshul can zhes chos ston to//
278b5(khri brgyad): gzugs stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba med pas te/ de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba med do zhes sems can rnams la chos ston to// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang
278b6(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams kyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba dang 'ong ba med pa'o// rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba med pa ste/ de lu 'gro ba med do// zhes sems
278b7(khri brgyad): can rnams la chos ston to// de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi spong ba nyid ni 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba med pa ste/ de la 'gro ba dang 'ong ba med
278b8(khri brgyad): do zhes sems can rnams la chos ston te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
279a1(khri brgyad): chub mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can rnams kyi rten du 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na rab 'byor chos thams cad na spong ba nyid
279a2(khri brgyad): kyi tshul can te/ de dag tshul de las mi 'da' ba'i phyir ro// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa'i tshul can de/ de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o//
279a3(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mtshan ma med pa la 'gro ba 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni smon pa med pa'i tshul nan de/ de ni
279a4(khri brgyad): tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ smon pa la 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mngon par 'du byed pa med pa ste/
279a5(khri brgyad): de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na mngon par 'du byed pa la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin du sbyar te/ rab 'byor chos thams
279a6(khri brgyad): cad ni skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i tshul can te/ de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o//
279a7(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i
279a8(khri brgyad): phyir ro// dbyor chos thams cad ni rmi lam lta bu'i tshul can te/ de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rmi lam la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba me dmigs
279b1(khri brgyad): kha'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad ni sgyu ma lta bu'i chutshul can dang / mig yor lnga ba'i tshul can dang / sprul pa lta bu'i chu la can te/ de dag
279b2(khri brgyad): ni tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sprul pa la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni skye ba med pa dang /
279b3(khri brgyad): dngos po med pa'i tshul can de/ de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skye ba med pa 'gro ba 'am pa 'am 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab
279b4(khri brgyad): 'byor chos thams cad ni mtha' yas mu med pa'i tshul can te/ de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mtha' yas mu med pa la/ 'gro ba
279b5(khri brgyad): 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni bri ba med pa dang bsnams pa med pa'i tshul can te/ de dag ni chu la de las mi 'da' 'o//
279b6(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dbri ba med pa dang snun pa med pa la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba med
279b7(khri brgyad): ba'i tshul can no// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni thang ba med pa dang / dar ba med pa'i tshul can de/ de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da' 'o// rab 'byor chos
279b8(khri brgyad): thams cad ni 'phrad pa med pa dang bral ba med pa dang / 'dre ba med pa dang / mi 'dri ba med pa'i tshul can no// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni de dag gi tshul
280a1(khri brgyad): rab 'byor chos thams cad ni bdag gi tshul can te/ de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor bdag la
280a2(khri brgyad): 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni sems can gyi tshul can gyi/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni srog dang skye ba po dang //
280a3(khri brgyad): gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shes las skyes dang / shid bu dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang dang / slong ba po dang / shes pa po dang /
280a4(khri brgyad): mthong ba po'i tshul can te/ de ni tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor bdag gtan med cing mi dmigs/ srog dang / skye ba po dang / bso ba
280a5(khri brgyad): dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / slong ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po yang
280a6(khri brgyad): gtan med na/ rab 'byor 'grong ba dang / 'ong ba lha dmigs par ga la gyur/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rtag pa'i tshul can te/ de dag ni chal de las mi
280a7(khri brgyad): 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rtag pa ci yang tan med na/ 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lha ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni bde ba'i tshul can te//
280a8(khri brgyad): de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da' bo// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni bdag gi tshul can dang / sdug pa'i tshul can te de dag ni tshul de la mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir
280b1(khri brgyad): zhe na/ rab 'byor rtag pa dang / bde ba dang / bdag dang / sdug pa gtan med na/ de dag 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lha ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad
280b2(khri brgyad): mi rtag pa'i tshul can/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / mi sdug pa'i tshul can/ de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o// de
280b3(khri brgyad): ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mi rtag pa gtan med cing / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / mi sdug pa gtan med na/ de'i 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lha ga la yod//
280b4(khri brgyad): rab 'byor chos thams can ni 'dod/ chags kyi tshul can te/ de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na 'dod chags kyi dngos po
280b5(khri brgyad): gtan med na 'dod chags lha ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni zhe sdang gi tshul can te/ de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na rab
280b6(khri brgyad): 'byor zhe sdang gi dngos po gtan med na zhe sdang lha ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni gti mug gi tshul can te/ de dag ni chu la de las mi 'da'o//
280b7(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na gti mug gi dngos po gtan med na zhe sdang gti mug lha ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni lta bar gyur pa'i dngos po'i tshul
280b8(khri brgyad): can te/ de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor lta bar 'gyur ba'i dngos po gtan med na/ lta ba gyur pa thams cad lha
281a1(khri brgyad): bya/ ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni de bzhin nyid kyi tshul can te/ de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
281a2(khri brgyad): rab 'byor de bzhin nyid la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni yang dag pa'i tshul can dang / mnyam pa nyid
281a3(khri brgyad): kyi tshul can dang / bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi tshul can te/ de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na rab 'byor bsam mi khyab pa'i
281a4(khri brgyad): dbyings la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mi g.yo ba'i tshul can te/ de ci'i phyir de dag ni tshul de las
281a5(khri brgyad): tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na rab 'byor chos 'ga' la yang g.yo ba med pas/ 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor chos thams
281a6(khri brgyad): cad ni gzugs kyi tshul can te/ de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na rab 'byor gzugs nyan med na de'i 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod//
281a7(khri brgyad): rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i tshul can te/ de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o//
281a8(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na rab 'byor rnams par shes pa gtan mi dmigs na/ de'i 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lha dmigs par ga la gyur rab 'byor chos thams cad sbyin pa'i pha/
281b1(khri brgyad): rol du phyin pa'i tshul can te/ de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na sbyin pa gdan med na sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa lha ga la yod/ rab
281b2(khri brgyad): rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i tshul can no// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang bas
281b3(khri brgyad): gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i tshul can te/ de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gtan
281b4(khri brgyad): med na de'i 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lha ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni nang spong ba nyid kyi tshul can no// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo
281b5(khri brgyad): za gad kyi tshul can te de dag ni de las mi 'dar/ de'i phyir zhe na/ dngos pa med pa'i nga'i zhing stong pa nyid kyi bar ni gzhan sa ma/ del 'gro ba'am 'ong
281b6(khri brgyad): ba lha ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams can dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i tshul can te/ de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na dran pa nye bar gzhag
281b7(khri brgyad): pa rnams gtan med na/ de dag ni 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba dmigs pa ga la yod/ rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad ni yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi
281b8(khri brgyad): rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang lam dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jig pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang
282a1(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi tshul can te/ de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na rab 'byor sangs rgyas
282a2(khri brgyad): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rgyun du bzhugs pa'i tshul can te/ de dag de chu la de la
282a3(khri brgyad): mi 'da' 'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi tshul can te//
282a4(khri brgyad): de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na rab 'byor rang sangs rgyas rnams la 'gro ba dang 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor chos
282a5(khri brgyad): thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi tshul can te/ de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na rab 'byor bla na
282a6(khri brgyad): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la ni 'gro ba dang 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das shes
282a7(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di las su dag mos par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'i bstsal pa/ 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sem
282a8(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa dang / sngon rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa dang / sngon gyi sangs rgyas
282b1(khri brgyad): rnams kyis yongasu smin par byas shing / dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po bye ba khri phrag 'bum dag la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / dge
282b2(khri brgyad): ba'i gshes gnyen gyis yongasu zin pa de dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par 'gyur ro// // shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
282b3(khri brgyad): khri brgyad spong pa las/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa'o// /
282b4(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par 'gyur
282b5(khri brgyad): ba de dag gi rtags rnams dang / rnam pa rnams dang / mtshan ma rnams dang / rang bzhin du gyur pa gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
282b6(khri brgyad): kyi tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di
282b7(khri brgyad): la mos pa de dag ni 'dod chags gsal bas dben pa'i rang bzhin can du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de dag ni 'dod chags kyi rtags kyi dben pa'i rang bzhin can
282b8(khri brgyad): du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni zhes sdang dang / gti mug gis rtags kyis dben pa'i rang bzhin can du 'gyuraro//
283a1(khri brgyad): rab 'byor de dag ni 'dod chags kyi mtshan mas dben pa'i rang bzhin can du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
283a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po de dag ni zhes sdang dang / gti mug gi mtshan mas dben pa'i rang bzhin can du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
283a3(khri brgyad): 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di rtogs par 'gyur ba de dag ji lta ba'i tshul can du 'gyur
283a4(khri brgyad): ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di
283a5(khri brgyad): rtogs pa de dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshul can du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems
283a6(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshul de dag ni/ sems can thams cad kyi rten lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa//
283a7(khri brgyad): rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin no// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la mos pa
283a8(khri brgyad): de dag ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshul can yin pas sems can thams cad kyi rten yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
283b1(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis 'di ltar bdag cag gis sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las zla bar bya'o// zhes go cha 'tshal
283b2(khri brgyad): la/ de la sems can dang sems su gdags pa yang mi dmigs pa de ni dka' ba bgyid pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab
283b3(khri brgyad): 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa gang dag gas
283b4(khri brgyad): sems can tham ca yong su mya ngan las brla bar bya'o// nas go chad dgos pa de dag ni bka' ba byed pa yin// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni
283b5(khri brgyad): gzugs dang 'brel ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na rab 'byor gzugs dang 'brel ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs dang / byang
283b6(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa'i go cha gtan med pa'i phyir te/ de bas na go cha de ni gzugs dang 'brel pa ma yin no zhes bya'o// rab 'byor go cha de ni tshor ba dang //
283b7(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang 'brel pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rnam par shes pa dang / byang chub sems
283b8(khri brgyad): dpa'i go cha gtan med pa'i phyir he/ rab 'byor de bas na go cha de dag ni rnam par shes pa dang 'brel ba ma yin no// rab 'byor go cha de ni bdag gi bar dang /
284a1(khri brgyad): 'brel ba ma yin zhing / sems can dang / srog dang / skye bo po dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skye
284a2(khri brgyad): ba dang / shed du dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / slong ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po dang / 'brel ma yin no// rab 'byor go cha de ni rnam pa thams
284a3(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid gyi bar dang 'brel ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gtan med na/ byang chub sems pa'i go cha gtan med
284a4(khri brgyad): cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar 'brel ba ma yin no// rab
284a5(khri brgyad): 'byor byang chub sems kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa gang zag gis 'di ltar bdag cag gis sems can thams cad yongasu mya ngan la bzla bar
284a6(khri brgyad): na bya'o zhes go chagos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de yin no// chos thams cad 'brel pa ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom
284a7(khri brgyad): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can yongasu mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o// zhes go cha 'tshal ba de ni/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
284a8(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi sa'i gnas gnyis su mchi bar 'tshal bar bgyi lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni gnas ma mchis shing / sgo skabs ma lags te/ byang chub sems dang
284b1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po gang sems can thams cad yongasu mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes de ltar go cha 'tshal ba de ni nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ba de ni
284b2(khri brgyad): gnas ma mchis lags so// de'i slad du zhe na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni sa mtshams bkum ste/ sems can rnams kyi ched du go cha 'chal ba ma
284b3(khri brgyad): lags pa'i slad du'o// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// rab 'byor khyod kyis don gyi dbang cig/
284b4(khri brgyad): zhig mthong na 'di skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar go cha dgos pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de ni nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
284b5(khri brgyad): rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i gnas gnyis las gnas cig tu mi 'gro bar shes pa bya'o zhes zer/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'
284b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po ni phyogs gcig gi sems can rnams kyi slad du go cha 'tshal ba ma lags kyi bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can
284b7(khri brgyad): thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i don du go cha 'tshal ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
284b8(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi slad du go che 'tshal ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sem
285a1(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po phyogs cig gi sems can rnams kyi phyir go cha bgos pa ma yin gyi/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
285a2(khri brgyad): po ni sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyir go cha bgos pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom
285a3(khri brgyad): ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni zab lags te/ de ni sus kyang bsgom par bgyi ba ma lags so// ji ltar yang bsgom par bgyi ba ma lags so//
285a4(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la ni gang bsgoms pa dang / gang la bsgoms pa dang / gang gis bsgom pa'i chos
285a5(khri brgyad): 'ga' yongs su grub pa yang mi dmigs te/ bcom ldan 'das 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa de ni nam mkha' bsgom pa lags so// 'di lta
285a6(khri brgyad): ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa de ni chos thams cad ma mchis pa bsgoms pa lags so// 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgoms pa de ni mchis
285a7(khri brgyad): pa bsgom pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lha ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom pa de ni/ yongasu 'dzin pa ma mchis pa'i slad du bsgom pa lags so// bcom
285a8(khri brgyad): ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor
285b1(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de gang bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
285b2(khri brgyad): ba bsgom pa de ni/ gzugs sgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so// de bzhin du 'di lha ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin de ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnam
285b3(khri brgyad): dang / rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lha ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni bdag bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa
285b4(khri brgyad): lags bcom ldan 'das 'di lha ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa de ni shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar du sgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so// bcom ldan
285b5(khri brgyad): 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa sgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol
285b6(khri brgyad): rol du phyin pa sgom pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du byin pa'i bar du sgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lha ske shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom pa de ni
285b7(khri brgyad): nang stong pa nyid la sgom pa rnam par 'jig pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du sgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste//
285b8(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so// 'di lha ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de ni yang dag pa'i
286a1(khri brgyad): spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lags dang / lam sgom pa rnam par
286a2(khri brgyad): 'jig pa lags so// 'di lha ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so// 'di lta ste shes
286a3(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ mi 'jig pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos bsgom pa rnam par 'jigs pa lags so//
286a4(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa de ni mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lag
286a5(khri brgyad): so// 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa de ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so// 'di lha ste shes rab kyi pha rol
286a6(khri brgyad): du byin pa sgom pa de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa
286a7(khri brgyad): nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du sgom pa rnam par 'jig pa la gso bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ 'di lta
286a8(khri brgyad): ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom pa de ni gzugs sgom pa rnam par 'jig pa yin no// de bzhin du sbyar te 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom pa de ni rnam pa
286b1(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa yin no// rab 'byor ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo//
286b2(khri brgyad): 'di la mngon par zhen par ma gyur tam/ zhes shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di las phyir ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongasu
286b3(khri brgyad): brtags par bya'o// de bzhin du sbyar te/ bsam gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrim
286b4(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa las phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor rnam pa tham
286b5(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag las phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongasu brtag par bya ste/ ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
286b6(khri brgyad): chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par zhen par ma gyur tam/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
286b7(khri brgyad): zab mo 'di la spyad pa gzhan gyis smra ba dang / gzhan gyis bstan pa la snying por mi lha 'am/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa'
286b8(khri brgyad): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'di la spyod pa de/ gzhan gyi dad pas mi 'gro 'am/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
288a1(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de/ 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa de dag gis mi 'phrogs sam//
288a2(khri brgyad): zhe sdang dang gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dag gis mi 'phrogs sam/ ci'i phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
288a3(khri brgyad): pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims gyis pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /
288a4(khri brgyad): bsam gtan gyis pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ ci phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
288a5(khri brgyad): pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di ston na 'di ston na mi skrag gram/ mi dngang ngam dngang par mi 'gyur ram/ zhum par mi
288a6(khri brgyad): 'gyur ram/ 'gro bar mi 'gyur ram/ de yang phyir phyogs par mi 'gyur ram/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang mi bral lam/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes
288a7(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhan pa la mngon par dga' 'am/ thos nas kyang 'dzin tan/ 'dzin 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ tshul bzhin du yade la byad dag/
288a8(khri brgyad): tshul bzhin du yid la byed dam/ de bzhin du nan tan byed dam zhes brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni sngon gyi dus
288b1(khri brgyad): na yang shes kyi pha rol du phyin pa zang mo 'di yongasu dri nga byas pa dang / bzung ba dang / bcas pa dang / klags pa dang / kun chub par byas pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byas
288b2(khri brgyad): bar rigs par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ston pa na mi skrag mi dngang da dang
288b3(khri brgyad): bar mi 'gyur zhing zhum par mi 'gyur/ 'gong bar mi 'gyur te/ yid phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ba'i steng du/ thos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa
288b4(khri brgyad): dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems
288b5(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di ston pa ni mi skrag mi dngang / dngang par mi 'gyur zhing / zhum par mi 'gyur/ 'gong par mi 'gyur te/ de'i yid
288b6(khri brgyad): phyir phyogs par yang mi 'gyur ba lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zang 'di ji ltar spyad par gyi/ bcom ldan
288b7(khri brgyad): 'das kyis bka' bskul pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems kyi rgyad rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol bas/ shes rab kyi
288b8(khri brgyad): pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la rnam par dpyad par bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems kyi
289a1(khri brgyad): rgyud rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la ji ltar rnam par dpyad par gyi/
289a2(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems kyi rgyud stong pa nyid la gzhol ba dang / stong pa nyid la 'bab
289a3(khri brgyad): bas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la rnam par dpyad pa yin no// rab 'byor sems kyi rgyud mtshan ma med pa la gzhol ba dang / smon pa med pa la gzha
289a4(khri brgyad): dang / sems kyi rgyud na mkha' la gzhol ba dang / de bzhin du sbyar te rab 'byor sems kyi rgyud skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa
289a5(khri brgyad): med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhol ba dang / sems kyi rgyud de bzhin nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / mnyam pa nyid dang
289a6(khri brgyad): bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang / gzhol bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la rnam par dpyod pa yin no// rab 'byor sems kyi
289a7(khri brgyad): rgyud mi lam lta bu la gzhol ba dang / sprul pa lta bu gzhol bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la rnam par dpyod pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/
289a8(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems kyi rgyud stong pa nyid la gzhol bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la
289b1(khri brgyad): rnam par dpyod pa yin no zhes bgyi ba nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems kyi rgyud rmi lam lta bu'i bar la gzhol bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol
289b2(khri brgyad): du phyin byin pa zab mo 'di la rnams par dpyod pa yin no zhes bka' bstsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs la yang
289b3(khri brgyad): rnam par dpyod par gyid lags sam/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la yang rnam par dpyod par lags sam/ de bzhin du rnam pa
289b4(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la yang rnam par dpyod par bgyid lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bskul pa// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
289b5(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po ni gzugs la rnam par dpyod par mi byed do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par dpyod par mi byed do//
289b6(khri brgyad): de bzhin du sbyar te rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bar rnam par spyod pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
289b7(khri brgyad): 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni sus kyang ma byas/ 'gyur bar ma byas/ gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/ gang
289b8(khri brgyad): du yang ma song / gang na yang ma 'dag/ yul nas yang mi gnas phyogs na yang mi gnas te/ de la ni grangs dang / 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba mi dmigs la/ gang
290a1(khri brgyad): la grangs dang / 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba mi dmigs pa de ni sus kyang mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par mi nus te/
290a2(khri brgyad): gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnams par shes pa dang / sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang /
290a3(khri brgyad): bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi bar mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
290a4(khri brgyad): gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i nyid yin pa dang / tshor ba nyid dang / 'du shes nyid dang / 'du byed rnams nyid dang / rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa
290a5(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
290a6(khri brgyad): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig go// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang
290a7(khri brgyad): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa 'di ni de bzhin nyid cig go/ de bzhin du pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / de bzhin nyid
290a8(khri brgyad): gang yin pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos de bzhin nyid yin pa dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin
290b1(khri brgyad): ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid yin no// de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos
290b2(khri brgyad): ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ 'dod chags 'dul ba'i le'u zhes bya ste/ bzhi bcu rtsa
290b3(khri brgyad): bdun pa'o// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa bam po sum bcu rtsa drug pa'o// // de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /
290b4(khri brgyad): gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis lha'i tsan dan gyi phyi ma blangs shing / lha'i me togs ud pa la dang / dad ma dkar po dag blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das
290b5(khri brgyad): ga la ba de logs su tor to// gtor nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/
290b6(khri brgyad): phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang / 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// /
290b7(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di
290b8(khri brgyad): las 'di skad du gzugs nyid rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang
291a1(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang / rnams par shes pa nyid kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/
291a2(khri brgyad): kyang rnam par shes pa'o// gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid yang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid
291a3(khri brgyad): de ni gcig te/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// de bzhin du sbyar te sangs rgyas rnams kyi bar gyi de bzhin glang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
291a4(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin yin pa de ni gcig ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med med do zhes stong pa 'di lta ste/ de bzhin
291a5(khri brgyad): gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub ni zab cing mthong bar bka' la/ rtogs par bka' ste/ brtag mi nus shing / rtog ge'i spyad pa ma lags la zhi
291a6(khri brgyad): ba zhi ba mo rtags pa'i mkhas pa dang 'dzangs pas rig pa lags te/ 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun pa lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang /
291a7(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyi 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams la 'di skad ces bka' bsngal to// lha'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te//
291a8(khri brgyad): lha'i bu dag gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pha ba 'di de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugaso// de bzhin du tshor ba dang /
291b1(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / 'dus byed rnams dang / rnams par shes pa nyid kyang rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes
291b2(khri brgyad): pa'o// de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi bar nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas so//
291b3(khri brgyad): gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nying gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig ste/ gnyis su med
291b4(khri brgyad): cing gnyis su dbyer med do// de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin
291b5(khri brgyad): nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid cig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyisu dbyer med do// don gyi dbang po de gzigs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin
291b6(khri brgyad): las chung ngu la thugs gzhol te chos bstan pa la gzhol ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na skye ma 'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub 'di zab cing
291b7(khri brgyad): mthong bar dka' la/ rtogs par dka' ste brtag mi nus shing rtogs ge'i spyod pa ma yin la/ zhi ba zhib mo rtags pa'i mkhas pa dang 'dzangs pas rig
291b8(khri brgyad): pa/ 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa yin te/ de ni sus kyang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing / gang du yang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te//
292a1(khri brgyad): gang la yang gnyis kun du rgyu ba med pa de ni chos rnams kyi zab pa nyid do// lha'i bu dag na mkha' zad pa'i phyir chos 'di zang bo//
292a2(khri brgyad): lnga'i bu bzhin nyid rab pa dang / chos kyi dbyings pa ba dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' bab pa dang / bsam gyil khyab pa'i dbyings rab pa'i phying chos 'dra ba /
292a3(khri brgyad): lha'i bu dag mtha' yas mu med pa dang / 'ong ba dang 'gro ba med pa'i mnyam pa nyid dang / skye ba dang / 'gag pa med pa mnyam pa nyid dang / kun nas gon pongs pa dang /
292a4(khri brgyad): rnam par byang ba med par mnyam pa nyid da/ mngon par 'du byed pa med pa nyid dang / bdag zab pa nyid dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar zab pa'i phyir chos
292a5(khri brgyad): 'di zad po// lha'i bu dag gzugs zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zab pa'i
292a6(khri brgyad): phyir chos 'di zab bo/ lha'i bu dag sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa zab pa dang / tshul khrims dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa/
292a7(khri brgyad): zang pa'i phyir chos 'di zab pa'o// nang stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//
292a8(khri brgyad): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam zab pa'i phyir chos
292b1(khri brgyad): 'di zad po// stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa zab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar du zab pa dang //
292b2(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad de mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du zab pa'i phyir/ lha'i de dag kye ma chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu rnams kyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das kye ma 'jig
292b3(khri brgyad): rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa'i chos 'di bstan lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ni gzugs bzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ mi bzung ba'i
292b4(khri brgyad): slad du yang ma lags/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ mi bzung ba'i slad du yang
292b5(khri brgyad): ma lags/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar du bzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ mi bzung ba'i slad du'ang ma lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom
292b6(khri brgyad): ldan 'das chos snyan pa zab mo 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ mi bzung ba'i slad da ma lags lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
292b7(khri brgyad): dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags mi bzung
292b8(khri brgyad): ba'i slad du ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten ni bdag gi gzugaso// bdag ni gzugs so// bdag ni tshor ba'o// 'du shes so// 'du byed rnams so//
293a1(khri brgyad): bdag ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i bras bu'o// rang gi phyir mi 'ong ba 'dres bu'o//
293a2(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa'o// bdag gi rnam par shes pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar du de bzhin du spyad/
293a3(khri brgyad): te/ bdag gi rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o// bdag ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o// bdag ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// bdag ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i
293a4(khri brgyad): 'bras bu'o// bdag gi dgra bcom pa nyid do// bdag ni dgra bcom pa'o// bdag gi rang byang chub bo// bdag ni rang byang chub bo// bdag gi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
293a5(khri brgyad): pa nyid do// bdag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// zhes bgyi bar 'dzin pa la spyod lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ lha'i bu dag de de
293a6(khri brgyad): bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu dag chos de ni gzugs gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa yang ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa yang ma yin no// tshor ba dang /
293a7(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bzung ba'i phyir snyan pa yang ma yin/ mi bzung ba'i phyir bstan pa yang ma yin no// lha'i rwa dag gang dag
293a8(khri brgyad): gzugs gzung ba'i phyir spyad pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bzung ba'i phyir spyod pa de dag la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bzung ba'i
293a9(khri brgyad): phyir spyod pa de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom pa'i skal ba med de/ bsam gtan dang / brtson 'grus dang / bzod pa dang / tshul khrims dang / sbyin pa'i
293b1(khri brgyad): pha rol du phyin pa'i bar du bsgom par mi nus so// rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ni chos thams cad dang 'thun pa lags te/ chos
293b2(khri brgyad): 'di chos gang dag dang 'thun pa lags she na/ chos 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang 'thun pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ni bsam gtan
293b3(khri brgyad): gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha
293b4(khri brgyad): rol du phyin pa'i bar dang 'thun pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ni nang stong pa nyid dang 'thun pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das chos de ni dngos po med
293b5(khri brgyad): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du 'thun pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang 'thun pa lagaso// chos
293b6(khri brgyad): 'di ni gang la yang thogs pa ma mchis lagaso// ci la thogs pa ma mchis she na/ gzugs la thogs pa ma mchis pa lags so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
293b7(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la thogs pa mchis pa lag so// de bzhin du rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la thogs pa ma mchis pa lag so//
293b8(khri brgyad): chos 'di ni nam mkha' mnyam pa nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa dang / yang dag pa'i mnyam pa nyid dang / bsam gyis mi khyad pa'i dbyings mnyam pa nyid dang /
294a1(khri brgyad): snang pa da dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mamam panyid dang / skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pam ma
294a2(khri brgyad): pa mnyam nyid dang / kun nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba mchis pa mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du thogs pa mchis pa'i mtshan nyid lags so// chos
294a3(khri brgyad): 'di ni gzugs skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa skye ba ma mchis pa
294a4(khri brgyad): dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa'i slad du skye ba ma mchis
294a5(khri brgyad): pa lags so// chos 'di ni gzugs kyi bzhi dmigs su ma mchis pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs su
294a6(khri brgyad): ma mchis pa dang / de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi gzhi dmigasu ma mchis pa'i slad du/ gzhi ma mchis pa lags so// de nas bcom
294a7(khri brgyad): ldan 'das la 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gnas rten rab 'byor ni bcom ldan
294a8(khri brgyad): 'das rjes su skyes pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar gnas han rab 'byor ci dang ci sten pa de dag thams cad stong pa nyid kho na las brtsam te ston
294b1(khri brgyad): ba'i slad du'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu dag gang 'di
294b2(khri brgyad): skad du bcom ldan 'das gnas gtan rab 'byor 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rje su skyes pa lagaso zhes smras pa ni/ ji ltar rjes su skyes pas gnas brtan rab 'byor
294b3(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes su skyes pa yin zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni ma 'ongs ma song ba ste/ de bzhin du rab 'byor gyi de bzhin
294b4(khri brgyad): nyid kyang ma 'ongs ma song ba ste/ de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang
294b5(khri brgyad): yin pa de nyid chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid do// chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid de/ de ltar na gnas brtan rab
294b6(khri brgyad): 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjesu skyes pa yin no// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtogs pa med pa de bzhin du gnas
294b7(khri brgyad): brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtogs pa ma med pa/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang la yang thogs pa med pa de
294b8(khri brgyad): bzhin du chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la yang thogs pa med de/ de gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang da de chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
295a1(khri brgyad): gnyis su
295a2(khri brgyad): / pa de ni gnyis su med de dbyer med do// de bzhin nyid ni ma byas pa ste/ de bzhin nyid de ni gang gi de bzhin du ma gyur ba
295a3(khri brgyad): 'ang med de/ gang gis phyir de bzhin nyid ma gyur pa yang med cing / nam yang de bzhin shing du ma gyur pa ma yin pa'i phyir/ de bzhin nyid gnyi su med cing gnyis
295a4(khri brgyad): dbyer med de/ de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjesu skyes pa yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni thams
295a5(khri brgyad): cad du 'gyur ba med cing / rnam par rtog pa med pa ste/ de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang thams cad ma du 'gyur ba med cing rnam par
295a6(khri brgyad): rtog pa med pa ste/ de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang thams cad du 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs
295a7(khri brgyad): ba'i de bzhin nyid tha mi dad ba dbyer med pa dmig su med pa/ de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang tha mi dad pa dbyer med pa dmig su med pa ste/
295a8(khri brgyad): de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang tha mi dad pa dbyer med pa dmigs su med pa ste/ de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gsheg
295a9(khri brgyad): pa'i rjesu skyeso// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yod pa ma yin te/ chos thams cad kyi/
295b1(khri brgyad): de bzhin nyid las gud na yang yod pa ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni/ nam yang de de bzhin nyid ma yin zhing / de ni rtag tu de bzhin nyid do/ gnas gtan rab
295b2(khri brgyad): 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang de lta bu ste/ de'i phyir rnam pa gzhag ma yin pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjesu skyes kyang gang du yang skyes pa med do// ji ltar
295b3(khri brgyad): de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da ltar byung ba ma yin pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang 'das pa'i
295b4(khri brgyad): ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da ltar byung ba ma yin no// de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin//
295b5(khri brgyad): da ltar byung ba ma yin te/ de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rje su skyes pa zhes bya'o// lha'i bu 'di la 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa
295b6(khri brgyad): nyi do// de la / pa 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do// /
295b7(khri brgyad): da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid du rig par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid kyi 'das
295b8(khri brgyad): ba'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do mnyam pa nyid kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid kyi//
296a1(khri brgyad): @da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do// de ltar 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / nga ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin
296a2(khri brgyad): gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med do// gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin
296a3(khri brgyad): gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis gzugs de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis blo bzhin
296a4(khri brgyad): gshegs pa'i de bzhin de nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid//
296a5(khri brgyad): de ltar na gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs
296a6(khri brgyad): ba'i de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis su dbyer med do// de bzhin du sbyar te bdag gi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin
296a7(khri brgyad): gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gnyi su med de gnyis dbyer med do// de bzhin du sbyar de bdag gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do// de
296a8(khri brgyad): bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis bdag gi de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar gyis de bzhin nyid kyi de bzhin
296b1(khri brgyad): gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis shes pa pa dang / mthong ba po'i bar gyi de bzhin nyid do// de ltar na 'dug
296b2(khri brgyad): gi de bzhin nyid dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar gyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gnyi su dbyer med de gnyis
296b3(khri brgyad): dbyer med do// de bzhin du sbyar te sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang /
296b4(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis su med de gnyisu dbyer med de/ nang stong pa nyid kyi
